venue.name: The Asgard Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Come one, come all! Let's resume our monthly brunch at Asgard this week, see old friends and meet new. Summer finds us with few opportunities to convene as a group, so let us make the effort to do so and catch up on our summer adventures and on our most recent uniquely-Atheist quips, comments, and related content!

The Boston Atheist brunches are a great opportunity for new members to meet folks who have been around for a while. Our brunch conversations range from politics to philosophy to computer science to folk musicology -- it really is an intellectually eclectic time. Even if you haven't attended a BA gathering before, please feel welcome to come out Sunday!
item.name: Blasphemy Brunch
